sentence.Network_en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentence.Network_en: This proposal is by no means a sure thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个提议绝不会理所当然地获得通过。

sentence.Network_en: The president was in full agreement with the proposal.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... transpose v 互换位置 proposal n 建议，提议 purpose n 目的，意图.
提案(proposal)：未经批准的决议称为提案，由于在Paxos算法中，每一个Proposer在一个没有关闭(closed，即还没最终选出决议)的 …
计画书 (Proposal)是在田野工作前所拟定的规画，或向赞助单位提出以供参考采择的一种规画。这种规画又依田野性质不同而异。

propose 计划proposer 申请人proposition 建议

entry.def: A proposal is a plan or an idea, often a formal or written one, which is suggested for people to think about and decide upon.

example.ex: The President is to put forward new proposals for resolving the country's constitutional crisis...
example.tran: 总统将提出解决国家宪法危机的新议案。

example.ex: ...the government's proposals to abolish free health care...
example.tran: 政府关于废除免费医疗保健的提案

entry.def: A proposal is the act of asking someone to marry you.

example.ex: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
example.tran: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

means.word_mean: 1. something proposed (such as a plan or assumption)
3. the act of making a proposal;

auth_sentence.content: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have outlined this proposal in more detail elsewhere.

auth_sentence.content: However the proposal didn't generate the necessary support.
auth_sentence.res_content: However the proposal didn't generate the necessary support.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However the proposal didn't generate the necessary support.

auth_sentence.content: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.
auth_sentence.res_content: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dispose安排+ed……的→任安排的→心甘情愿的
in不+disposed[adj.愿意的,想干的]→adj.不愿意的,身体不适的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 作家, 作曲家, 设计者, 著作者
stems_affixes.word_buile: compose创作+er人→composer作家, 作曲家
pose放→n.姿势,姿态 v.造成,提出,摆姿势,佯装
propose[v.计划, 建议, 向……提议, 求[婚] v.打算, 求婚]+al表名词→n.提议,建议;求婚

调换, 颠倒顺序, 移项

Sentence.sentence: He responds readily to the other party's proposals.

sentences.en: They presented concrete proposals for improvement.
sentences.cn: 他们提出了具体的改进建议。

sentences.en: She had had many proposals but preferred to remain single.
sentences.cn: 许多人向她求过婚, 但她愿过独身生活。

jushi.english: She had had many proposals but preferred to remain single.
jushi.chinese: 许多人向她求过婚,但她愿过独身生活。

jushi.english: It seems a proposal about building a bridge has been made.
jushi.chinese: 建一座桥的提案似乎已呈上。

jushi.english: My proposal is that we should send a few comrades to help the other groups.
jushi.chinese: 我的建议是我们派几个同志去帮别的小组。
